summary: Frontend i18n translation testing - Portuguese 'Turno' translations verified but Report screen has critical untranslated strings

translation_issues.issue: Multiple hardcoded English strings not using t() function for translation
affected_strings: Line 2075: 'Report Preview' - should use t('report.reportPreview') or similar
Line 2087: '{filteredSessions.length} session{s} found' - should be translated
Line 2098: 'Generate Report' button text - should use t('report.generateReport')
Line 2150: 'Total Points' label - should use t('report.totalPoints')
Line 2179: 'By Target Type' - should be translated
Line 2213: 'No data for any target type in selected period' - should be translated

action_items: CRITICAL: Replace all hardcoded English strings in report.tsx with t() function calls

Add missing translation keys to en.json and pt.json if they don't exist (e.g., 'reportPreview', 'sessionsFound', 'performanceReport', 'overview', 'averages', 'byTargetType', 'perSession', 'noTargetData')
Verify report.tsx lines 2070-2250 use proper i18n translation calls
critical_code_review_comments: The pt.json file correctly uses 'Turno' instead of 'Volta' for round translations - this part is CORRECT
The Report screen (report.tsx) was partially translated - t() function is imported and used in some places but NOT in the report display section
Need to audit report.tsx lines 2073-2250 for all English strings and replace with t() calls
Translation keys exist in pt.json under 'report' namespace but are not being utilized in the code

turno_vs_volta_translation.details: pt.json correctly uses 'Turno' (not 'Volta') for all round-related translations: scoring.round='Turno', history.round='Turno', summary.round='Turno', sessionSetup.arrowsPerRound='Flechas por Turno', etc.

home_screen_translation.details: Verified: 'Nova Sessão', 'Treino e Prática', 'Competição', 'Histórico', 'Arcos' all display correctly in Portuguese

history_screen_translation.details: Header shows 'Histórico', tabs show 'Sessões' and 'Relatório', filters show 'Dia/Semana/Mês/Ano/Tudo'

bows_screen_translation.details: 'Os Meus Arcos', 'Sem Arcos', 'Adicionar Arco', 'Tipo de Arco', 'Recurvo', 'Guardar Arco' all correct

report_screen_translation.details: Report screen shows English labels: 'Generate Report', 'Configure Report', 'Date Range', 'Last Week/Month/Year', 'Report Preview', 'sessions found'. Translation keys exist in pt.json but t() function not used for these strings in report.tsx

summary_screen_header.details: pt.json has summary.title='Resumo do Turno' - translation key exists and should display correctly

screenshots_taken: 08_home_portuguese.png - Home page correctly showing Portuguese translations
seed_data_creation: Attempted to create test bow 'Arco de Teste' for session flow testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: The Report screen (report.tsx) has translation keys defined in pt.json but the component is NOT using t() function for many UI strings in the report display section (lines 2073-2250). Main agent needs to replace hardcoded strings with t() calls. Other screens (Home, History, Bows, Session Setup) translate correctly.

rca_of_the_issue.root_cause: report.tsx was partially translated - the initial selection screen uses some t() calls but the report display screen (lines 2073-2250) has many hardcoded English strings
reproduction_steps: 1. Set language to Portuguese via Settings or localStorage.setItem('@arrow_tracker_language', 'pt')
2. Navigate to History -> Relatório tab (or direct to /report)
3. Observe that labels like 'Generate Report', 'Date Range', 'Last Week', 'Report Preview' are in English
4. Compare with pt.json which has proper translations under 'report' namespace
rca_of_the_issue.mitigation: Replace all hardcoded English strings in report.tsx with appropriate t() function calls using the existing translation keys from pt.json
